name: Council on College Admission in South Dakota (CCASD)
address: This organization is an association of professionals and does not have a single physical address for consulting services. They coordinate college fairs throughout the year
description: CCASD is an association of college admission counselors, high school counselors, financial aid officers, and independent college consultants who serve students and families exploring educational and career options after high school
services: Atheist-owned College consulting in South-Dakota consultation

name: South Dakota State University - First Year Advising Center
